answers.answer: Congratulations,well i will put it this way it's for a good cost right, just follow the doctor advice and they are lots  of  diabetes diet you can use and follow . Ok gooodluck dear and stay blessed .
Check out Dr.Joel Fuhrman bookEat to LiveHe has one about diabetes too,Forgot the name of it but you can find it online with the author name . Best of everything to you!
There is a diabetes group on here too
There is a diabetes group on here too
Some countries don't even test for glucose while pregnant.

I have GD and it's not that bad, I promise! I mean, I won't wish it on anyone, but if you do wind up with it, try not to worry. I just have to check my sugar 4 times a day, and I take a very small amount of insulin with each meal, and aanother dose of a slow-acting insulin at bed time. Easy stuff, so if it happens to you, don't be scared! :)

question: I have 12 weeks and a few days I found out I am in the border line sitting 1% of getting diabetes while pregnant my next test will be in a month or two. I am not a big fan of counting my calories and stuff but I know for sure I do not want to be diebetic at all. Do anyone one have any suggestions on healthy eating or Any apps to learn what to do to prevent having diabetes?
title: Any suggestions?
